title: New Ekko Skins
body:
Roit can you please make a new ekko skin.He has not gotten a skin in ages please how agrees with me comment if you want it as well {{champion:245}}

Example:Lunar Eclipse Ekko or beach Ekko

replies.body: Thanks guys think that PROJECT ekko would be cool same with Zac or something like that{{champion:245}}
The PROJECT line is based around angular design and futuristic weapons. I don't see at all how Zac fits into that.
Academy Ekko was lame but i think there are a few champs that need a new skin first. would be cool to see a commando skins revamp though.
I agree and I think that PROJECT: Ekko would be awesome !{{champion:245}} {{champion:245}}
